synopsis.text: By the majestic Moon Mountain, Leo, the resplendent white lion, rules the jungle with his beloved family. However, their harmonious existence is disrupted when ruthless humans, driven by greed, invade their territory in search of the fabled Moonlight Stones. As the jungle's protector, Leo embarks on a perilous quest to find these legendary stones before the humans can exploit them. Meanwhile, Leo's adventurous son, Lune, intrigued by the human world, sets off on his own journey, unaware of the impending dangers. As a mysterious illness sweeps through the jungle, Leo must not only confront the human threat but also find a cure to save his kingdom. With the help of unlikely allies, Leo's courage and resilience are put to the test as he strives to preserve the jungle's peace and protect his loved ones.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
